name: Skyscraper - Real Time TCG
description:
Summon units, cast spells and defeat opponents!

Skyscraper is a realtime multiplayer card game.
Easy to play, but completely addictive!
Download the game and start thrilling battles now!
NOTE: A network connection is also required.

■Battle
Battle with players from all over the world!
Defeat them to get rewards!

■Cards
80+ cards are waiting for you!
Collect cards and upgrade them!

■Deck
One battle deck requires 12 cards.
Build your very own powerful deck!

■Join a Union
There are 5 different Unions battling for the top.
Join your favorite Union!

■Explore the Tower
In a huge tower, there are Crystals with mystic power.
Explore the tower and collect the Crystals!
